code: var Books=[{genreName:'Action',bookList:[{bookName:'Blue Moon',bookAuthor:'Lee Child',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/91zoEg1ofML.jpg',bookDescription:'Jack Reacher #24. Jack Reacher is back in a brand new white-knuckle read from Lee Child, creator of ‘today’s James Bond, a thriller hero we can’t get enough of’ (Ken Follett). Jack Reacher is a former military cop, trained to notice things.'},{bookName:'Wood\'s Destiny',bookAuthor:'Steven Becker',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/518pGO8uJbL.jpg',bookDescription:'Living on a small island in the Florida Keys is a dream for many. For salvor, diver, and fisherman Mac Travis, though, it’s a way to become invisible. But trouble has a way of finding Mac, who makes a shocking discovery while attempting to save his friends and his boat from the wrath of the storm and deliver desperately needed supplies to the Bahamas.'},{bookName:'Mafia Lust',bookAuthor:'Bella King',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41dtnBRX0pL.jpg',bookDescription:'Mafia Lust is a dark and dramatic appeal to love, danger, and the spirit of organized crime. Bonds will be tested, and trust may be broken, but that’s what happens when you fall for a mafia boss. Be prepared for a twisted ride through city streets, hotels, cars, boats, and steamy bedrooms when you pick this one up to read.'},{bookName:'The FIGHTER',bookAuthor:'Robert White',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/511-Tm2MwTL._SX331_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg',bookDescription:'THE FIGHTER is the final chapter in the current series of Rick Fuller thrillers. Be prepared for a very bumpy ride'},{bookName:'Nightshade',bookAuthor:'Anthony Horowitz',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51huSZBhOeL.jpg',bookDescription:'Alex is on his own, with the fate of thousands of people resting in his hands.'}]},{genreName:'Novel',bookList:[{bookName:'Loreless',bookAuthor:'P J Whittlesea',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/410MUBHKCZL.jpg',bookDescription:'Part quest, part ghost story, and part contemporary fable, Loreless combines mysticism, wisdom, and wonder into an inspiring tale of self-discovery.'},{bookName:'1984',bookAuthor:'George Orwell',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51iq85zLtRL.jpg',bookDescription:'Hidden away in the Record Department of the sprawling Ministry of Truth, Winston Smith skilfully rewrites the past to suit the needs of the Party. Yet he inwardly rebels against the totalitarian world he lives in, which demands absolute obedience and controls him through the all-seeing telescreens and the watchful eye of Big Brother, symbolic head of the Party. In his longing for truth and liberty, Smith begins a secret love affair with a fellow-worker Julia, but soon discovers the true price of freedom is betrayal.'},{bookName:'After the End',bookAuthor:'Clare Mackintosh',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41nEwnEnpOL.jpg',bookDescription:'Max and Pip are the strongest couple you know. Only now they\'re facing the most important decision of their lives - and they don\'t agree.'},{bookName:'Small Great Things',bookAuthor:'Jodi Picoult',bookImage:'https://cdn.waterstones.com/bookjackets/large/9781/4447/9781444788037.jpg',bookDescription:'When a newborn baby dies after a routine hospital procedure, there is no doubt about who will be held responsible: the nurse who had been banned from looking after him by his father. What the nurse, her lawyer and the father of the child cannot know is how this death will irrevocably change all of their lives, in ways both expected and not.'},{bookName:'Half a World Away',bookAuthor:'Mike Gayle',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51PLJSeQLsL._SX332_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg',bookDescription:"Strangers living worlds apart. Strangers with nothing in common."}]},{genreName:'Fantasy',bookList:[{bookName:'Darklight',bookAuthor:'Bella Forrest ',bookImage:'https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1564077367l/51841062._SX318_SY475_.jpg',bookDescription:'Those beasts had preyed on humanity for millennia, committing senseless, brutal murders. Like the rest of my colleagues at the Occult Bureau, I looked forward to a world where we could all sleep at night—where constant cover-up jobs were no longer required to keep the public calm and unaware.'},{bookName:'Once Upon a River',bookAuthor:'Diane Setterfield',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/91Hr0HU9AdL.jpg',bookDescription:'Diane\'s masterful storytelling draws you in to a beguiling tale, full of twists and turns like the river at its heart, and just as rich and intriguing'},{bookName:'The Silent Patient',bookAuthor:'Alex Michaelides',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81zTPgET+nL.jpg',bookDescription:'Alicia Berenson lived a seemingly perfect life until one day six years ago. When she shot her husband in the head five times. Since then she hasn\'t spoken a single word.'},{bookName:'Brave New World',bookAuthor:'Aldous Huxley',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51IikE1TS1L.jpg',bookDescription:'Far in the future, the World Controllers have created the ideal society. Through clever use of genetic engineering, brainwashing and recreational sex and drugs all its members are happy consumers. Bernard Marx seems alone harbouring an ill-defined longing to break free. A visit to one of the few remaining Savage Reservations where the old, imperfect life still continues, may be the cure for his distress...'},{bookName:'Flight 39',bookAuthor:'Phillip P. Peterson',bookImage:'https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1522929625l/39723182._SX318_.jpg',bookDescription:'For a top-secret research project, airline pilot Christoph Wilder is recruited to fly an A380 equipped with a time machine. But on the maiden voyage, activists hijack the plane and force Christoph to take them back to 1939. Their goal: to kill Adolf Hitler! But the price to pay for averting the Second World War exceeds Christoph’s worst nightmares. He has to decide whether to save the dictator’s life in order to prevent the downfall of humanity in the present day.'}]},{genreName:'Non-fiction',bookList:[{bookName:'The Little Big Things',bookAuthor:'Henry Fraser',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61cOy%2BI-lwL.jpg',bookDescription:'This book combines his wisdom and insight into finding the gifts in life\'s challenges, and will resonate with anyone facing an obstacle, no matter how big or small.It includes Henry\'s thoughts on how to look at the right things and avoid the wrong, finding progress in whatever you do, and acknowledging and accepting the darkness when it comes. Right at the heart of Henry\'s inspiring philosophy is his belief that every day is a good day.'},{bookName:'The Prison Doctor',bookAuthor:'Dr Amanda Brown',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/716NMoK+jgL.jpg',bookDescription:'Dr Amanda Brown has treated inmates in the UK s most infamous prisons first in young offenders institutions, then at the notorious Wormwood Scrubs and finally at Europe s largest women-only prison in Europe, Bronzefield.'},{bookName:'Atomic Habits',bookAuthor:'James Clear',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51Fqn4+UodL._SY344_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg',bookDescription:'In this ground-breaking book, Clears reveals exactly how these minuscule changes can grow into such life-altering outcomes. He uncovers a handful of simple life hacks (the forgotten art of Habit Stacking, the unexpected power of the Two Minute Rule, or the trick to entering the Goldilocks Zone), and delves into cutting-edge psychology and neuroscience to explain why they matter. Along the way, he tells inspiring stories of Olympic gold medalists, leading CEOs, and distinguished scientists who have used the science of tiny habits to stay productive, motivated, and happy.'},{bookName:'Prisoners of Geography',bookAuthor:'Tim Marshall',bookImage:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51stgjdVHqL.jpg',bookDescription:'In ten chapters and ten maps, Prisoners of Geography looks at the past, present and future to offer an essential insight into one of the major factors that determines world history.'},{bookName:'Invisible Women',bookAuthor:'Caroline Criado Perez',bookImage:'https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/71db66ZoJdL.jpg',bookDescription:'From government policy and medical research, to technology, workplaces, and the media. Invisible Women reveals how in a world built for and by men we are systematically ignoring half of the population, often with disastrous consequences. Caroline Criado Perez brings together for the first time an impressive range of case studies, stories and new research from across the world that illustrate the hidden ways in which women are forgotten, and the profound impact this has on us all.'}]}];export default Books;
